nodes.bodyText:
Is still need it this report?
Can't you use the general one?
I would prefer the general one; we need to maintain this as well.
if you still need this, pls then rename it and put it in the generic package

nodes.bodyText: Using the general one which has a much higher height, a blank space appears on new pages for new bpartners. As the general one is only used in the page title where there is enough blank space until the report starts, that is not a problem there, however in this case it is.
